transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm not a car. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I take kids to a place to learn
🛑 I stop frequently to pick up passengers
💛 I am often yellow

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people or goods. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a canoe
⚓️ I can travel across oceans
🚢 Some are used for vacationing

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird
✈️ I need a runway to land
💺 I have seats for passengers

transport.question: I run on tracks, and can carry many people or goods across long distances. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I don't go on roads
🚂 I often have many carriages
⏱️ I have a schedule

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals. You use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 I am good for exercise
🔔 I usually have a bell
🛣️ You can ride me on a bike path

transport.question: I am a type of car that you can hire to take you somewhere. I have a driver. What am I?

hints.text: 🚕 I often wait near train stations
💰 You pay based on distance travelled
📱 You can call one on an app

transport.question: I travel to space and carry astronauts. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast
👨‍🚀 I can orbit the Earth
👩‍🔬 I can be used for scientific research

transport.question: I am a two-wheeled vehicle, but I have a motor. What am I?

hints.text: 🛵 You need a license to drive me in most places
🏍️ I am faster than a bicycle
⛑️ You should always wear a helmet when riding me

transport.question: I travel underwater and can carry people or be used for research. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I can go very deep
🌊 I am often used by the navy
🤿 Some are used to explore shipwrecks

transport.question: I am a vehicle that can fly straight up and down, and I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can land on a rooftop
🚑 Some are used for medical emergencies
🚨 Some are used by the police

plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I can be tall, but I have no legs. I wear green leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow outside.
☀️ I need sunshine to live.
🪵 Birds might build a nest in me.

plant.question: I am a small plant that you can eat. Rabbits love me!

hints.text: 🥗 I am often found in salads.
🥬 I am leafy and green.
🐇 I'm a favorite snack for bunnies.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful flowers. Be careful when you pick me!

hints.text: 🥀 I'm often given as a gift.
🌹 I can be red, pink, or white.
🌵 I have thorns.

plant.question: I grow underground and come in different colors like orange, purple, or white. Bugs Bunny loves me

hints.text: 🥕 I'm a root vegetable.
🌱 I grow in the ground
🐰 I am Bugs Bunny's favorite food.

plant.question: I have a long stem and grow very tall. You can eat me, but only after you cook me.

hints.text: 🌽 I am often grown on farms.
💛 My kernels are yellow.
🎬 People eat me at the movies.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on trees. Squirrels love to bury me.

hints.text: 🌰 I am a type of nut.
🐿️ Squirrels hide me for winter.
🍂 I fall from trees in the autumn.

plant.question: I start as a seed, then grow into a vine with orange fruit that you carve for Halloween.

hints.text: 🎃 I am a symbol of Halloween.
🧡 I am often used to make pie.
🌱 I need lots of sun to grow.

plant.question: I am a seed that makes a yummy snack when popped. You can add butter and salt.

hints.text: 🍿 People eat me at the movie theater.
🌾 I come from a tall plant with ears.
💥 I make a popping sound when cooked.

plant.question: I am a giant tree that lives a very long time. Some of my relatives are the biggest trees on Earth.

hints.text: 🌲 I am found in California.
🪵 My wood is reddish-brown.
🌎 I am a very old and tall species of tree.

plant.question: I am a plant whose seeds make a drink that many adults enjoy to help wake them up.

hints.text: ☕ I am often served hot.
🌎 I grow best in warm climates.
🌱 My seeds are roasted before being used.
